mn67:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā cātumāyaṁ viharati āmalakīvane.
mn67:2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena sāriputtamoggallānappamukhāni pañcamattāni bhikkhusatāni cātumaṁ anuppattāni honti bhagavantaṁ dassanāya.
mn67:2.2_0: Te ca āgantukā bhikkhū nevāsikehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ paṭisammodamānā senāsanāni paññāpayamānā pattacīvarāni paṭisāmayamānā uccāsaddā mahāsaddā ahesuṁ.
mn67:3.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āmantesi:
mn67:3.2_0: “ke panete, ānanda, uccāsaddā mahāsaddā, kevaṭṭā maññe macchavilope”ti?
mn67:3.3_0: “Etāni, bhante, sāriputtamoggallānappamukhāni pañcamattāni bhikkhusatāni cātumaṁ anuppattāni bhagavantaṁ dassanāya.
mn67:3.4_0: Te āgantukā bhikkhū nevāsikehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ paṭisammodamānā senāsanāni paññāpayamānā pattacīvarāni paṭisāmayamānā uccāsaddā mahāsaddā”ti.
mn67:4.3_0: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato paṭissutvā yena te bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami;
mn67:4.5_0: “Evamāvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato ānandassa paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
mn67:4.5_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinne kho te bhikkhū bhagavā etadavoca:
mn67:4.6_0: “kiṁ nu tumhe, bhikkhave, uccāsaddā mahāsaddā, kevaṭṭā maññe macchavilope”ti?
mn67:4.7_0: “Imāni, bhante, sāriputtamoggallānappamukhāni pañcamattāni bhikkhusatāni cātumaṁ anuppattāni bhagavantaṁ dassanāya.
mn67:4.8_0: Teme āgantukā bhikkhū nevāsikehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ paṭisammodamānā senāsanāni paññāpayamānā pattacīvarāni paṭisāmayamānā uccāsaddā mahāsaddā”ti.
mn67:5.1_0: “Gacchatha, bhikkhave, paṇāmemi vo, na vo mama santike vatthabban”ti.
mn67:5.2_0: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paṭissutvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā senāsanaṁ saṁsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya pakkamiṁsu.
mn67:6.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena cātumeyyakā sakyā santhāgāre sannipatitā honti kenacideva karaṇīyena.
mn67:6.2_0: Addasaṁsu kho cātumeyyakā sakyā te bhikkhū dūratova āgacchante;
mn67:6.3_0: disvāna yena te bhikkhū tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā te bhikkhū etadavocuṁ:
mn67:6.6_0: “Tenahāyasmanto muhuttaṁ nisīdatha, appeva nāma mayaṁ sakkuṇeyyāma bhagavantaṁ pasādetun”ti.
mn67:6.7_0: “Evamāvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū cātumeyyakānaṁ sakyānaṁ paccassosuṁ.
mn67:7.1_0: Atha kho cātumeyyakā sakyā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
mn67:7.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho cātumeyyakā sakyā bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
mn67:7.4_0: Seyyathāpi, bhante, bhagavatā pubbe bhikkhusaṅgho anuggahito;
mn67:7.5_0: Santettha, bhante, bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṁ dhammavinayaṁ.
mn67:7.6_0: Tesaṁ bhagavantaṁ dassanāya alabhantānaṁ siyā aññathattaṁ, siyā vipariṇāmo.
mn67:7.7_0: Seyyathāpi, bhante, bījānaṁ taruṇānaṁ udakaṁ alabhantānaṁ siyā aññathattaṁ siyā vipariṇāmo;
mn67:7.8_0: evameva kho, bhante, santettha bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṁ dhammavinayaṁ, tesaṁ bhagavantaṁ dassanāya alabhantānaṁ siyā aññathattaṁ, siyā vipariṇāmo.
mn67:7.9_0: Seyyathāpi, bhante, vacchassa taruṇassa mātaraṁ apassantassa siyā aññathattaṁ, siyā vipariṇāmo;
mn67:7.10_0: evameva kho, bhante, santettha bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṁ dhammavinayaṁ, tesaṁ bhagavantaṁ apassantānaṁ siyā aññathattaṁ, siyā vipariṇāmo.
mn67:7.13_0: Seyyathāpi, bhante, bhagavatā pubbe bhikkhusaṅgho anuggahito;
mn67:8.1_0: Atha kho brahmā sahampati bhagavato cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya—seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṁ vā bāhaṁ pasāreyya, pasāritaṁ vā bāhaṁ samiñjeyya;
mn67:8.2_0: Atha kho brahmā sahampati ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṁ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
mn67:9.3_0: Seyyathāpi, bhante, bhagavatā pubbe bhikkhusaṅgho anuggahito;
mn67:9.4_0: Santettha, bhante, bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṁ dhammavinayaṁ, tesaṁ bhagavantaṁ dassanāya alabhantānaṁ siyā aññathattaṁ, siyā vipariṇāmo.
mn67:9.5_0: Seyyathāpi, bhante, bījānaṁ taruṇānaṁ udakaṁ alabhantānaṁ siyā aññathattaṁ, siyā vipariṇāmo;
mn67:9.6_0: evameva kho, bhante, santettha bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṁ dhammavinayaṁ, tesaṁ bhagavantaṁ dassanāya alabhantānaṁ siyā aññathattaṁ, siyā vipariṇāmo.
mn67:9.7_0: Seyyathāpi, bhante, vacchassa taruṇassa mātaraṁ apassantassa siyā aññathattaṁ, siyā vipariṇāmo;
mn67:9.8_0: evameva kho, bhante, santettha bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṁ dhammavinayaṁ, tesaṁ bhagavantaṁ apassantānaṁ siyā aññathattaṁ, siyā vipariṇāmo.
mn67:9.11_0: Seyyathāpi, bhante, bhagavatā pubbe bhikkhusaṅgho anuggahito;
mn67:10.1_0: Asakkhiṁsu kho cātumeyyakā ca sakyā brahmā ca sahampati bhagavantaṁ pasādetuṁ bījūpamena ca taruṇūpamena ca.
mn67:11.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhikkhū āmantesi:
mn67:11.3_0: Pasādito bhagavā cātumeyyakehi ca sakyehi brahmunā ca sahampatinā bījūpamena ca taruṇūpamena cā”ti.
mn67:12.1_0: “Evamāvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa paṭissutvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pattacīvaramādāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
mn67:12.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
mn67:12.2_0: “kinti te, sāriputta, ahosi mayā bhikkhusaṅghe paṇāmite”ti?
mn67:12.5_0: Appossukko dāni bhagavā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṁ anuyutto viharissati, mayampi dāni appossukkā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāramanuyuttā viharissāmā’”ti.
mn67:12.6_0: “Āgamehi tvaṁ, sāriputta, āgamehi tvaṁ, sāriputta, diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāran”ti.
mn67:13.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ āmantesi:
mn67:13.2_0: “kinti te, moggallāna, ahosi mayā bhikkhusaṅghe paṇāmite”ti?
mn67:13.5_0: Appossukko dāni bhagavā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṁ anuyutto viharissati, ahañca dāni āyasmā ca sāriputto bhikkhusaṅghaṁ pariharissāmā’”ti.
mn67:13.7_0: Ahaṁ vā hi, moggallāna, bhikkhusaṅghaṁ parihareyyaṁ sāriputtamoggallānā vā”ti.
mn67:14.5_0: imāni, bhikkhave, cattāri bhayāni udakorohante pāṭikaṅkhitabbāni.
mn67:15.1_0: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, cattārimāni bhayāni idhekacce puggale imasmiṁ dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajite pāṭikaṅkhitabbāni.
mn67:16.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti:
mn67:16.3_0: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto;
mn67:16.4_0: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
mn67:16.5_0: Tamenaṁ tathā pabbajitaṁ samānaṁ sabrahmacārī ovadanti, anusāsanti:
mn67:16.6_0: ‘evaṁ te abhikkamitabbaṁ, evaṁ te paṭikkamitabbaṁ, evaṁ te ālokitabbaṁ, evaṁ te vilokitabbaṁ, evaṁ te samiñjitabbaṁ, evaṁ te pasāritabbaṁ, evaṁ te saṅghāṭipattacīvaraṁ dhāretabban’ti.
mn67:16.8_0: ‘mayaṁ kho pubbe agāriyabhūtā samānā aññe ovadāma, anusāsāma.
mn67:16.9_0: Ime panamhākaṁ puttamattā maññe, nattamattā maññe, amhe ovaditabbaṁ anusāsitabbaṁ maññantī’ti.
mn67:16.11_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, ūmibhayassa bhīto sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvatto.
mn67:17.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti:
mn67:17.3_0: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto;
mn67:17.4_0: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
mn67:17.5_0: Tamenaṁ tathā pabbajitaṁ samānaṁ sabrahmacārī ovadanti anusāsanti:
mn67:17.6_0: ‘idaṁ te khāditabbaṁ, idaṁ te na khāditabbaṁ;
mn67:17.6_1: idaṁ te bhuñjitabbaṁ, idaṁ te na bhuñjitabbaṁ;
mn67:17.6_2: idaṁ te sāyitabbaṁ, idaṁ te na sāyitabbaṁ;
mn67:17.6_3: idaṁ te pātabbaṁ, idaṁ te na pātabbaṁ;
mn67:17.6_4: kappiyaṁ te khāditabbaṁ, akappiyaṁ te na khāditabbaṁ;
mn67:17.6_5: kappiyaṁ te bhuñjitabbaṁ, akappiyaṁ te na bhuñjitabbaṁ;
mn67:17.6_6: kappiyaṁ te sāyitabbaṁ, akappiyaṁ te na sāyitabbaṁ;
mn67:17.6_7: kappiyaṁ te pātabbaṁ, akappiyaṁ te na pātabbaṁ;
mn67:17.6_8: kāle te khāditabbaṁ, vikāle te na khāditabbaṁ;
mn67:17.6_9: kāle te bhuñjitabbaṁ, vikāle te na bhuñjitabbaṁ;
mn67:17.6_10: kāle te sāyitabbaṁ, vikāle te na sāyitabbaṁ;
mn67:17.6_11: kāle te pātabbaṁ, vikāle te na pātabban’ti.
mn67:17.7_1: ‘mayaṁ kho pubbe agāriyabhūtā samānā yaṁ icchāma taṁ khādāma, yaṁ na icchāma na taṁ khādāma;
mn67:17.7_2: yaṁ icchāma taṁ bhuñjāma, yaṁ na icchāma na taṁ bhuñjāma;
mn67:17.7_3: yaṁ icchāma taṁ sāyāma, yaṁ na icchāma na taṁ sāyāma;
mn67:17.7_4: yaṁ icchāma taṁ pivāma, yaṁ na icchāma na taṁ pivāma;
mn67:17.9_0: Yampi no saddhā gahapatikā divā vikāle paṇītaṁ khādanīyaṁ bhojanīyaṁ denti tatthapime mukhāvaraṇaṁ maññe karontī’ti.
mn67:17.11_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, kumbhīlabhayassa bhīto sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvatto.
mn67:18.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti:
mn67:18.3_0: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto;
mn67:18.4_0: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
mn67:18.5_0: So evaṁ pabbajito samāno pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya pavisati.
mn67:18.6_0: Arakkhiteneva kāyena arakkhitāya vācāya anupaṭṭhitāya satiyā asaṁvutehi indriyehi so tattha passati gahapatiṁ vā gahapatiputtaṁ vā pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappitaṁ samaṅgībhūtaṁ paricārayamānaṁ.
mn67:18.8_0: ‘mayaṁ kho pubbe agāriyabhūtā samānā pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappitā samaṅgībhūtā paricārimhā.
mn67:18.9_0: Saṁvijjanti kho pana me kule bhogā.
mn67:18.10_0: Sakkā bhoge ca bhuñjituṁ puññāni ca kātun’ti.
mn67:18.12_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, āvaṭṭabhayassa bhīto sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvatto.
mn67:19.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti:
mn67:19.3_0: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi dukkhotiṇṇo dukkhapareto;
mn67:19.4_0: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
mn67:19.5_0: So evaṁ pabbajito samāno pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya pavisati.
mn67:19.6_0: Arakkhiteneva kāyena arakkhitāya vācāya anupaṭṭhitāya satiyā asaṁvutehi indriyehi so tattha passati mātugāmaṁ dunnivatthaṁ vā duppārutaṁ vā.
mn67:19.7_0: Tassa mātugāmaṁ disvā dunnivatthaṁ vā duppārutaṁ vā rāgo cittaṁ anuddhaṁseti.
mn67:19.8_0: So rāgānuddhaṁsena cittena sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattati.
mn67:19.9_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, susukābhayassa bhīto sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvatto.
mn67:20.1_0: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri bhayāni, idhekacce puggale imasmiṁ dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajite pāṭikaṅkhitabbānī”ti.
mn67:20.3_0: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
